menu.title: Yildiz Online is a free strategy multiplayer game.
index.create.title: Create colonies
index.create.desc: Start with one colony, create buildings to generate resources, build warships, spy your enemies...
index.resource.title: Gather resources
index.resource.desc: The more resources you get, the more opportunities opened to you: build a bigger army, create more efficient buildings, hire mercenaries, trade...
index.fleet.title: Build your fleet
index.fleet.desc: You'll begin with small spaceships, but that's just the beginning, soon you will build powerful missile launchers, long range laser weapons...
index.attack.title: Send your warships against your foes
index.attack.desc: Destroy their fleet to steal their precious resources, grow more powerful until no one can match...
index.modal.create.title: Create your account
index.download.button.notready.title: Not yet available
index.download.button.notready.text: If you have an account, you will receive an email when the client gets available.
account.creation.success.title: Account created
account.creation.success.content: An email has been sent to you, click in it to confirm your account.
account.validation.error: This account could not be created
connect.login_short: The chosen login should be at least 3 characters.
connect.pwd_short: The chosen password should be at least 5 characters.
connect.login.invalid: The chosen login cannot contains special characters.
account.validation.error.login.exists: The chosen login is already registered.
account.validation.error.email.exists: The chosen e-mail is already registered.
error.title: An error occurred
error.server.unavailable: The server is unavailable, please retry in a moment.
